page.title: 20THE RUGBY CENTRE.
page.content: The Rugby Centre was opened on 17th.,June,1980.It contains a group of shops all situated together under cover,so people can have all-weather shopping.It is complete with a multi- storey car park for 500 cars,a restaurant and a cafeteria,with the different floors being linked by 4 lifts.The Centre is open from 8.30 a.m. to 5.30.p.m. on Monday,Tuesday, Wednesday and Saturday.On Thursday and Friday it is open from 8.38.a.m. till 8.00.p.m. There is direct pedestrian access to the centre from North Street,Market Place and Chapel Street.There is also access through the Chapel Street Co-op Store as the rear of the store forms one of the centre shops.Sold are toys, electrical and D.I.Y. goods,books,food & drink,toiletries,clothes,holidays, stationery,papers,records & jewellery.
